title: Gillani expresses condolences on demise of Taj Haider
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 09 (APP):Chairman Senate Syed Yousaf Raza Gillani has expressed deep sorrow and grief over the demise of senior politician, intellectual, and prominent leader Senator Taj Haider.
In his condolence message, he termed the late senator as a shining chapter in the political history of Pakistan and said that Taj Haiderâ€™s long struggle for the country, democracy, and public rights is unforgettable.
The Chairman Senate stated that Senator Taj Haider was not only a principled and ideological politician but also a symbol of intellectual guidance, integrity, and public service. His contributions will always be remembered.
His demise is a great loss for the nation. He extended heartfelt sympathies and condolences to the bereaved family and prayed that Allah Almighty grant the departed soul a place in His infinite mercy and bestow patience and strength upon the bereaved family.
